review: It works ok. I think it would work better if my DSL was faster. The occasional lag is tollerable, and when my satellite tv drops out due to foul weather, the stick still works!
author: FF-Ed

review: I needed it to show movies from Amazon Prime and connect my mother to Netflix.  Mission Accomplished.
author: Bud Ford

review: I really enjoy the Fire Stick. It has so many more options than some of the other products out there.
author: Anonymous

review: very easy to install and start using!
author: Ana Jordan

review: I SO love the Amazon Fire Stick!! I have always had Roku.  I like the way the Fire Stick is set up.  It is easy to navigate, find movies, TV shows, everything!  I am going to get more for each TV.
author: R. Dectres

review: Have not been able to get the fire stick to work.
author: Pen Name

review: I love my fire tv sticks! I bought two! I get all sorts of choices like Pandora, Netflix, Amazon Prime, and more... a lot more!!
author: Heidi Hafner
